pageContext.description: The hammer end seems to have been smoothed down, after the edge was broken off, but it does not appear to have been used a great deal as a hammer.
pageContext.patina: Remainder is nearly covered wtih - thin green patina roughly encrusted, with golden bronze showing a good deal.
pageContext.surface: Slightly rough. The loop side is almost covered with gravel (encrusted with green patina) + part of this side and the loop are plain dark golden bronze.
pageContext.other: Length: 76.5mm,Width: hammer face 28.5mm; butt end 31mm,Thickness: hammer face 15.5mm; wings 33mm + 33 1/4mm; septum 8 1/4mm,Weight: 294.13 gms
pageContext.associations: One of a Bronze Founder's Hoard.
pageContext.collection: Colchester Museum,Deposited by W. C. Wells Esq. 1911,(2362.11)
